content: *** crochet pattern - instant download *** this is not the finished item crochet your own ester baby blanket a modern fun pattern that creates a funky finished blanket the perfect baby gift 8 page full colour pdf pattern written in english available in both usa and u k stitch terms difficulty this blanket is the perfect challenge for a beginner looking to improve their skills or for an experienced crocheter looking for a quick and modern make this pattern comes with permission to sell your finished items materials needed - approx 300g dk weight yarn for the body - approx 50g of dk weight yarn in the colour of your choice for the edge - 4mm crochet hook for the body of the blanket - 3 5mm crochet hook for the edging of the blanket - tapestry needle & scissors size completed blanket is approximately 60x80cm but instructions on how to increase/decrease size are given within the pattern i would love to see any finished items you make - you can find me on facebook https //www facebook com/snufflebeanyarn and on instagram @snufflebeanyarn
